tool.name: associationAnalysis

param.name: mirAnno
param.label: Input miRNA annotation
param.help: Note: The annotation file can be obtained from three ways: i) upload your local, ii) generated by miRNACuration, iii) generated by miRNARetrieval tool.

param.name: genomeAnno
param.label: Input Genome annotation file in FLAT format
param.help: Note: users can use the tool GFF-to-FLAT to convert GFF to FLAT format

tool.help:
.. class:: donemark
**What it does**
This function is designed to perform interactive analysis and visualization of miRNAs.
.. class:: donemark
**Input**
1. Annotation file of miRNAs derived from databases or *de novo* identification.
2. Genome annotation were used to label the source of miRNA.
.. class:: donemark
**Output** *associationAnalysis* provides visualization and summarization of miRNAs in interactive and animated charts.
